about.title: The Developer Behind the Code
about.description:
I serve a deep passion for creating smart, autonomous systems that drive efficiency. What started as building simple websites has evolved into a focused mission: designing intelligent AI agents and interconnected digital ecosystems that solve complex real-world problems. I thrive on exploring emerging technologies and leveraging the latest tools to build solutions that are not only powerful but also intuitive and helpful for everyone.

Beyond my full-time role, I’m building real-world tools for early-stage and small businesses at my startup, prismas.in.
Prismas is the very first node of my dream; there is a big tree behind it.
